page.description: Enables ability to define multiple layouts for the ViewBox.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Has multiple layouts]* property let's you enable multiple layouts for a ViewBox. Layouts can be set using the [ViewBox Control Actions] Action JavaScript or configured to change automatically based on the device's orientation (see the [Auto-select on orientation change] property.)
When checked, the *[ui:Mulitple Layouts]* tab is added to the ViewBox builder. The [Auto-select on orientation change] property is also exposed.
